content: ख्यातिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [ख्या-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Renown, fame, reputation, glory, celebrity; <ls>Ms. 12. 36</ls>; <ls>Pt. 1. 371.</ls> {@--2@} A name, title, appellation {@--3@} Narration. {@--4@} Praise. {@--5@} (In <ab>phil.</ab>) Knowledge, the faculty of discriminating objects by appropriate designation; <ls>Śi. 4. 55.</ls> {@--6@} Praise.
